author: slive
msg: Add a note about case-sensitivity to the windows platform docs.
Partially in response to the disputed vulnerability:

author: danj
msg: Updated muse.xml schema to allow for 'use-router-persistence' flag on <resource-type/>. This is the
implementation of MUSE-60. Resource types must now "opt-in" to the router persistence so that the EPRs
of the resource instances will be saved and reloaded. Opt-in is done by setting the use-router-persistence
attribute on <resource-type/> to 'true' (default = 'false'). This allows for the auto-creation of some
resources, which may in turn handle the creation of other resource types as part of their implementation.

author: proyal
msg: Modify language in "what version should i use" language to match advice given on the mailing list
